title: authentication endpoint user login
description: verify that the user can successfully log in using the authentication endpoint with valid credentials and receive appropriate session tokens.

title: dashboard endpoint load statistics
description: verify that the dashboard endpoint loads and returns the main panel statistics, including trend graphs and critical alerts.

title: df8d management endpoint create nonconformity
description: verify that the df8d management endpoint allows creating a nonconformity record and supports tracking of 8D problem-solving steps.

title: supplier quality endpoint list suppliers
description: verify that the supplier quality endpoint returns a list of suppliers with details and calculates ppm/otd metrics correctly.

title: customer complaints endpoint create complaint
description: verify that the customer complaints endpoint allows creating a complaint, tracks sla, and supports action plan creation.

title: internal audit endpoint create audit
description: verify that the internal audit endpoint allows creating an audit, recording findings, and using the question bank.

title: quality cost management endpoint create cost record
description: verify that the quality cost management endpoint allows creating cost records and viewing copq analysis.

title: other modules endpoint navigation and crud
description: verify that the other modules endpoints support navigation, successful crud operations, and form validations.
